text: William H. "Bill" Flores (born February 25, 1954) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for Texas from 2011 to 2021. On September 5, 2019, Flores announced his intent to retire in the 2020 election cycle. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Bill Flores official U.S. House site * Bill Flores for Congress * * * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Politicians from Wyoming Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Bill Flores
